body.name: Linenspa Folding Metal Platform Bed Frame - No Box Spring Needed - Underbed Storage - Simple Tool Free Assembly - Mattress Foundation - 14" High - Traditional Design - Sturdy Steel - Queen Size

features: GOODBYE BOX SPRING: Sturdy steel construction with a surface grid pattern, anti-slip treads, and a foldable design provide even support, exceptional stability, and ultimate convenience with or without a box spring

EXTRA STORAGE: With 13 inches of clearance, this platform bed frame offers plenty of underbed storage to help you keep your sleep spaces neat and organized, plus it folds up making it the perfect option for kids rooms, guest rooms, or smaller spaces

EASY ASSEMBLY: Gone are the days of frustrating furniture assembly, this platform bed frame can be assembled in less than 5 minutes—simply unfold the base and hand tighten the leg support bolts; headboard and brackets sold separately
EVEN SUPPORT FOR ALL MATTRESS TYPES: Lightweight but sturdy, this platform bed frame is compatible with most mattresses, holds up to 1,000 pounds, and brings a modern simplicity to your space

REST ASSURED: The bed frame has steel support braces for stability and is backed by a 5-year warranty that guards against manufacturer defects; purposely constructed one inch shorter than standard mattresses to provide convenience, safety, and support
body.description: Get the support you need without the inconvenience of a bulky box spring with the Linen spa 14 Inch Folding Platform Bed Frame. This 14-inch solid steel platform frame creates 13 inches of usable storage space under your bed for all that stuff that doesn’t really have a place. With a 750-pound weight capacity, a grid-surface design, anti-slip rubberized treads, and a five-year , this frame is reliable, sturdy, and provides support in all the right places. And if all of that isn’t enough, this frame can be set up by a single person in under five minutes and with no extra tools. Just unfold it, tighten the leg support bolts with your hand, add a mattress and use it as is or nestle it inside an existing bed set you love. Note, the frame is one inch shorter than your mattress on all sides to provide convenience, safety, and ideal support.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 8, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars I put it together in 30 mins
reviews.reviewText: I really love how sturdy this thing is!Super easy to put together .... did it in 30 mins. I weigh 115-117 lbs and I laid down as heavily as I could on the bed after putting his mattress on it and checked to see if it sank in, made noise, or moved from the spot I put it on the floor..... it did none of these. I think you can attach a headboard to it. I just left it in case my 11 y.o. decides he wants a particular headboard on it when he's older. It also has quite a bit of space from the floor to the bottom of the bed if you ever need to store something under it.I'd buy this again for sure.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 28, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Metal bed frame.
reviews.reviewText: Easiest bed frame I have ever put together, snapped together like Legos. Very sturdy and great quality. Black metal powder coated frame, light weight, great appearance, has slots to add a headboard if we want to, very versatile. Perfect height to store totes under to keep my sons room organized. Also very affordable.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 8, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I brought this for the mattress my parents sent for the guest bed room. It was easy to assemble and is very sturdy.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 12, 2023
reviews.reviewText: A lot of the reviews mention that it’s easy to assemble and doesn’t take long however I found that to be only somewhat true. I would say assembly definitely needs two people. My daughter had to help me with this and it took us almost an hour or so to finally get it all together. One of the bars had trouble sliding in place and got stuck. It nearly cut us when trying to pull it out. The instructions are easy to read and understand and it comes with all the tools and parts you need. You won’t need additional tools.I’ve had it now for a few months and have no complaints. It’s easy to move and I love it’s height. It was a bit out of my price range but if price isn’t an issue this is the one to go with.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 4, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Setup between myself and my husband took us about 20 minutes and is holding up well

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 20, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Really easy to build
reviews.reviewText: Not a robot it’s a great buy and easy to build

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 12, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Had it over a week and it's super!
reviews.reviewText: I have one arm and unfolded this bed in a few minutes mind you I haven't screwed the halves together yet but I put my old mattress on it (it's a japanese floormat I got on amazon I have a real mattress coming today and I'll put that on top of it) It was quiet when I moved around and I put regular sized boxes of medical supplies underneath. I love it so far but I also was sleeping on the floor lol. Maybe I wont screw the halves together. Plus side itllmake 2 great twin beds! Oh for $106.00 this is my best investment since my car! Week update love it! Was worried about feeling bars through the mattress so I put my japanese floormat under my mattress which is a thin type memory foam. I love that this bed feels solid no creaking as my other metal frame did yet is so light and easy to move. Great frame!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 17, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very well designed and solid
reviews.reviewText: Excellent choice. Works very well. Solid and sturdy with great underneath storage height.
ligera pero resistente, facil de armar y la puedes llevar en tu carro cuando te mudes

Es muy facil de armar, tiene buena calidad, sin duda vale la pena, recomiendo su compra. El precio es muy competitivo. NO es una cama ruidosa, al moverla de lugar es silenciosa, y NO resbala en el piso, por lo que te brinda buena comodidad.
Very sturdy, silent and extremely easy to put together and take apart. The height allows for suitcases to be stored underneath! I have it in my office/guest room and couldn’t be happier with it!

By far, this was the biggest and heaviest furniture item I have ordered from Amazon, and by far, it was the easiest to put together! It is very very very solid, no squeaking, none! And no need for a bedspring. My queen-size mattress fits perfectly.The only problem was the headboard: the holes the slots of the iron base were not aligned with the holes in my headboard, so I simply drilled 2 new ones, and so far so good. I know people like to rave about the space underneath the bed, and how much they can fit under there, but I love how it looks empty, clean, it gives the impression of my bedroom being much more spacious and spotless just because of that wide empty space. Highly recommand; will revisit this comment in a year, just to see if I'm still happy with my purchase.
Es una buena opción para base de cama viene en las medidas indicadas y sirve muy bien para almacenamiento en la parte de abajo. El material es bueno
